Welcome to my blog! 

On this site, I'll be posting some thoughts on data (and data science) ethics, inspired by ideas discussed in the book *Data Feminism* by Catherine D'Ignazio and Lauren F. Klein.

I plan on covering a variety of topics and hope you will find something that interests you!
